reviews.review:
El juego esta mal diseñado ya que permite la toxicidad desmedida de los jugadores sin consecuencias lo que termina por ser un problema. No se puede jugar si eres nuevo y no puedes hacer nada si los otros jugadores asi lo quieren.

UPDATE: He jugado 400 horas mas, juegalo con amigos y no juegues enserio es la unica forma en que es relativamente disfrutable esta cosa.

UPDATE 2: He jugado 300 horas mas y lo unico que quiero es retirarme de este juego de mierda, ojala explotara la compañia

Recomendo se vc quiser passar muita raiva, jogo lixo demais.
completamente desbalanceado, tem 50 assassinos, mais apenas uns 3 são realmente jogáveis pq os outros são muito fracos e lentos, no começo até que da pra jogar com ele, mais conforme vai pegando sobreviventes mais experientes eles brincam com a sua cara, se vc jogar contra sobreviventes mais experientes não tem muito oq fazer, é muito desbalanceado, dependendo do killer que vc for jogar enquanto vc mata uma pessoa os caras já fizeram uns 3 geradores, ainda corre o perigo de alguem te cegar com a lanterna e o infeliz fugir das suas costas, os geradores são consertados muito rapido se o killer não tiver uma mobilidade absurda fica feito idiota no mapa e não da tempo de fazer nada, pra piorar eu sou ranking baixo, comecei a jogar ontem e toda hora eu caiu com sobreviventes rank 1, 3, etc...
não da tempo de fazer nada, se vc vai comprar pq como eu viu um monte de killer dahora como nemesis, Pyramid Head, Mayers, o Ghostface, LeatherFace etc, saíba que todos eles são práticamente inuteis contra players mais experientes, os unicos killer que são mais competitivos é a Enfermeira "Nurse", o espirito e talvez o caipira "billy"
de resto só funciona com noobs, e mesmo os killer mais forte demora pra vc pegar prática com eles, até lá vão ser muitas horas passando raiva jogando com sobreviventes experientes que ainda ficam tirando barato com a sua cara no fim da partida, se quer passar raiva este é o game, pra mim eu to fora, jogo pra me divertir e não me estressar.
fora que além de tudo mesmo jogando bem provavelmente vc vai levar uma surra direto até ter centenas de horas de jogo, pq pra montar build não basta vc upar aquele personagem que vc gosta especifico, vc tem que comprar varios outros que vc não curte jogar, inclusive alguns de DLC com dinheiro real, upar a arvore de habilidade deles para desbloquear certos atributos necessarios pra vc adicionar no seu personagem principal, até vc juntar todas essas skills e pegar a manha da mêcanica do jogo pra começar a ter resultados satisfatorios vão ser necessarias centenas de horas de muita raiva.
e pra terminar não existe opção de mudar a resolução do jogo de jeito nenhum, jogo em uma tela de 50 polegadas e o jogo fica horrivel todo embassado pq a resolução fica travada em 1080p, não consigo aumentar pra 1444p ou 4k nem ferrando.
晚上玩并把音量开大 认真修机 回头看到杀手的时候你会跳起来

It's only fun with friends. Don't play this game in random queues. However if you like it for the horror character aspect then this is for you, but the same rule of playing with friends only applies. I think it would be cool if the killers could face each other instead of only four random people fixing shit around a map at a snails pace vs a brokenly stacked killer.

İlk 25-30 saatlik süreçte, jumpscare atan hag, ghostface tarzı s2msonik katiller ve iç karartan haritaları dolayısıyla korku-gerilim oyunu diyebiliriz. Fakat oyunda kendinizi temelden bir tık üst seviyeye taşıdığınız anda facecamp atan leatherface'inden, kancaya pusu kuran ghostface'inden, sluglayanından, tunellayanından, farmlayanından artık gına gelmeye başlıyor. Tavsiyem katil oynamanız çünkü kötü bir takım ve rezalet katiller oyun zevkinizin içine sıçırtabilir. özellikle ruskilerden uzak durun.
 Lisanslı katiller ve survivorlar (%60'ı) yalnızca dlc ile satın alınabiliyor fakat oyundaki meta katiller genellikle oyun içi para ile alınabilenler. Ayrıca survivorlardan gelen perklerde haftalık güncellenen mağazadan oyun içi parayla alınabiliniyor. Yani yapımcılar her ne kadar aç gözlü olsa da p2wlik bir durum yok. Kitlesi biraz düzgün olsaydı daha zevkli olurdu ama yine de oynatıyor.
Dead by Daybug

To put it frankly, there are few games in my lifetime that I have sunk a lot of my time into. Dead by Daylight is one of them. On the surface level, it's quite appealing to the horror aficionado, with it's dark atmosphere and it's collection of well know horror franchise characters. But, diving deeper into the game provides a thrilling experience in which you find yourself engrossed in a fun and competitive asymmetrical game that provides hours of new experiences and builds within the characters that you play. It is challenging, rewarding, and at times, frustrating. Nonetheless, the game is a worthwhile experience that is a breath of fresh air with it's originality in the gaming market. 

To put it simply, I highly recommend playing this game, and  suggest introducing your friends to the game as well, for a fun and thrilling gaming experience.

Por que recomendar uma obra prima do terror online dessas?
 Bom vamos lá... o jogo te faz adentrar num modo onde, você pode jogar com até 4 amigos e 1 assasino e nao só isso. Mas também pode usar o modo public match, onde você pode entrar como sobrevivente e zoar o assasino... ou ser um assasino frenético e moldar a sua própria caçada. E o melhor... um assasino super conhecido no mundo das séries/filmes ou a história padrao do jogo. Mas sendo cada partida, uma mais engraçada ou tensa do que a outra. e sendo tudo isso em , o jogo ainda tem meio que um lado competitivo. Onde você tenta ser com o seu grupo os melhores survivors, ou então ser o assasino mais implacavel do jogo...
good game

我算是个新手，免费周白嫖了一下，发现这个游戏确实挺好玩的。刚开始玩幸存者的时候被打的找不着北，队友来救我都没用，不过有时候在钩子上看队友被屠夫追的满头包，然后一杆子打了个后空翻时也会幸灾乐祸，不过最终我还是放弃了求生者路线。后来开始玩小叮当，游戏体验就好起来了，开始把人类追的到处跑。第一次看见恩断义绝板的时候笑疯我了，手电侠被老头一个板挡在白房外被我一刀撂倒，然后挂地下室。我也曾见过慌不择路结果被我堵进死路，然后无奈地原地转圈圈，大陀螺的新手，那局我第一次故意放走了那个人和他的一个小伙伴。我开始故意的给看起来菜菜的幸存者放水，并且意识到这个游戏的乐趣，是在肆意追杀人皇时的斗智斗勇和让新手幸存者完成并逃出一场游戏的开心，这些被我故意放走的人大多数会在出口向我表示感谢，有时会丢下手中的工具箱或医疗包什么的，一场游戏双份的开心。当然那些喜欢对着我指指点点的，没事打手电的我必然死追。之前看到评论区差评有人说屠夫太弱了，我觉得这是应该的，因为这游戏是需要大量的幸存者玩家才能支持下去的游戏。另外这只是个游戏，不要胜负心太重，享受追逐过程中的惊险与刺激才是最重要的。最后非常感谢游戏的开发组和那些认真且素质游戏玩家（无论是屠夫还是幸存者）为我们带来如此好的游戏和环境体验。

I'm not one to write reviews but here I am writing one for 'Dead by Daylight'. This is a fun game if you are a simple person and don't mind doing the same objectives over and over again (Until you reach 1k+ hours hehe whoops), and if you have the argument with it's not the same thing over and over again well counter argument argument would be you are kinda right there are different killers and different play styles required to play those killers but the main objective of the game is the same, repair generators, hit skill checks, run away from killers(or Nea), heal other players, escape, and or die. Now you are asking why should I buy and play this game? The reason would be not for the game play but the people who play this game, I know super cheesy but it's actually true. I have met so many amazing people and yeah there is always going to be that one toxic player but I've met so many amazing players that are super supportive and friendly. Then if you get 5 people you can play KYF or kill your friends which is a fun game mode where you can hear your friends scream like a little kid and can brighten up everyone's mood!!! 
      Now this is just everything that was everything good, and everyone knows if there is a good there is always bad and I won't try to shine a light on only the good. Now lets talk about the bad, in all the ranks most killers can run N.O.E.D or 'No One Escapes Death' which is annoying perk and can completely change the outcome of any game IF you don't get all 4 totems and to be honest there are not a lot of people who look for them so either you have to go out and take a look around the entire make and take them out if you don't want to deal with Noed and you wont even know if they had that perk or not so you could have done that for nothing or you just saved the other players. Now onto face campers anyone who plays this game will know the pain and annoyance of these types of killers which can be beaten with a perk called 'Borrowed Time' (A little note not a lot of people run this but the people that do run this and come and save you thank them haha!). Then there are the no good survivors, ughhh this hurts to talk about so long story short if you see someone just hiding the entire match doing nothing just pray that they get sacrificed first or pray the other survivors are doing the generators along with you and pray that the other survivors save you before you die. Then if you play killer be ready for flashlight blinds, hooks to be sabotage, survivors being able to run you around, survive with friends, and if you bring a more be ready for them to possibly complain. (: 
   Now somethings to note if you have decided to get into 'Dead by Daylight' the first advice will be survivor then some killer advice. When you get into your first game be aware of your surroundings if you seen a flashing light there a generator there (if you are playing on a map with buildings the light in the building will be flashing as well), if you don't want to be detected by the killer just be aware that the killer can see what I call chicken scratch (Bright red lines left behind your survivor left there for seconds where they could possibly find where you ran off to), and I'm sorry to say this but any of the in closed maps in my opinion are extremely frustrating and I hate my life when I get them and I have zero advice on them with survivor or killer except good luck T-T. Now if you decide you want to play killer good luck play around with the killers and see which one you love and want to dominate with and don't be scared to experiment with other killers, second look at the layout of the generators and see what would be the best path to look around for survivors, and look around when walking from the generators and you might see some chicken scratch. Now some advice for both sides is probably and it’s my best advice. Play both killer and survivor so you have knowledge on both sides and can understand if you can do something different.
   I hope you've enjoyed and found this review helpful <3
